channel.title: CodeSmith on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in CodeSmith on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Initial database design done
item.description: As always we started the day with meetings. Today, we finished up the initial database design portion and actually started making tables and merging the data together. I suspect that we will have at least one maybe two days left of just classifying and merging data. There were several things that I learned today, most of it was MS SQL commands like (sp_who, sp_lock, sp_helptext, kill 60). It is always nice to see the commands in action and get a detailed explanation of what they return and do.
